thread.title: John Calipari Walks Out Of Interview As Missouri Student Section Chants At Him
thread.title_full: John Calipari Walks Out Of Interview As Missouri Student Section Chants At Him

author: Patrick Redford
title: John Calipari Walks Out Of Interview As Missouri Student Section Chants At Him
text:
Go to permalink 
Kentucky traveled to Columbia to play SEC basement dwellers Missouri tonight, and the game was uncomfortably close at halftime. No. 11 Kentucky held just a one-point lead over the Tigers at the half, and Missouri fans let Cal have it while he was doing an interview with a reporter from the SEC Network. Advertisement 
Calipari apparently had enough and he awkwardly shuffled away from the last question of the interview as fans serenaded him with a rousing “Cal you suck!” chant. Recommended Stories
